title: Heard and not seen
creator_credit: A. Henley and Masters and Boys of Holloway School
brief_description: A boy sent out of art class for misbehaviour mixes a drink in the chemistry laboratory which makes him invisible. A series of amusing incidents ensue. Finally the effects wear off and he is caught in the headmaster’s office.
creator_credit_for_label: A. Henley and Masters and Boys of Holloway School
